lead_paragraph: Ms. Armitage hopes her latest dance will inspire people to act on issues like climate change and overpopulation.

headline.main: Review: ‘On the Nature of Things,’ Karole Armitage’s New Dance Work
headline.print_headline: Tugging at Heartstrings for the Planet’s Sake

snippet: Ms. Armitage hopes her latest dance will inspire people to act on issues like climate change and overpopulation.
